CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_mx_seo_actions ( id INT(11) PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, hash char(32) NOT NULL, action_id INT(2) NOT NULL, data TEXT, insert_ts TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CONSTRAINT mxseo_unique_index UNIQUE INDEX (hash, action_id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;
